comments:
Eclipse version >= Build id: I20070828-0800

Steps To Reproduce:

(1) Launch a runtime eclipse workbench
(2) Create a new plug-in project using the RCP Mail template
(3) Click either the run or debug form header button to launch
    -> BUG: The following exception occurs
    -> If you click the "Launch an eclipse application" hyperlink
       it launches another runtime workbench
    -> Click the form header button again and it works like the hyperlink

org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:84)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.Assert.isNotNull(Assert.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredSelection.<init>(StructuredSelection.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.PDELauncherFormEditor.launch(PDELauncherFormEditor.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.PDELauncherFormEditor$1.run(PDELauncherFormEditor.java:79)
	at org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.actions.ActionMenu.run(ActionMenu.java:36)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.Action.runWithEvent(Action.java:498)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.handleWidgetSelection(ActionContributionItem.java:543)
	at org.eclipse.jface.action.ActionContributionItem.access$2(ActionContributionItem.java:489)

	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runEventLoop(Workbench.java:2389)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.runUI(Workbench.java:2353)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.access$4(Workbench.java:2219)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench$4.run(Workbench.java:466)
	at org.eclipse.core.databinding.observable.Realm.runWithDefault(Realm.java:289)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.Workbench.createAndRunWorkbench(Workbench.java:461)
	at org.eclipse.ui.PlatformUI.createAndRunWorkbench(PlatformUI.java:149)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.ide.application.IDEApplication.start(IDEApplication.java:106)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.internal.app.EclipseAppHandle.run(EclipseAppHandle.java:169)

	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.invokeFramework(Main.java:515)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:455)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:1193)
	at org.eclipse.equinox.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:1169)

Unable to reproduce.

1) Launched a fresh workspace using I20070828-0800 + PDE HEAD code.
2) Created RCP app using Mail template.
3) Clicked the run button on the form header.

The RCP app launched as expected. I had the same results performing these steps with the debug button. Were you using an older code base? Or perhaps it was something about your workspace...?

I am unable to reproduce either using I20070828-0800 + latest PDE code from HEAD.
I have a feeling my workspace might have been corrupt; since, I was testing 15 million different things at the time.

I'll leave it up to you as to whether you want to add a NULL guard on the launch object (either abort the launch or raise a dialog).

Lets leave the null guard out for now.

I would like to have the world explode if and when this happens again so that we can take another shot at isolating the use case and fixing the problem properly.

marking as worksForMe to clean up bug list.  If we get a reproducible scenario, we can reopen bug.

Thanks for investigating guys.
